block.p: FLORIDA PROGRESS CORP., St. Petersburg, Fla., a utility holding company, said its shareholders had approved the company's acquisition by CP&L Energy, Raleigh, N.C.
EL PASO ENERGY, Houston, an energy holding company, purchased units of Enerplus Group, Calgary, Alberta, a manager of oil and gas income funds. Terms were not disclosed.
FLORIDA PROGRESS CORP., St. Petersburg, Fla., a utility holding company, said its shareholders had approved the company's acquisition by CP&L Energy, Raleigh, N.C.
EL PASO ENERGY, Houston, an energy holding company, purchased units of Enerplus Group, Calgary, Alberta, a manager of oil and gas income funds. Terms were not disclosed.
CONSTELLATION ENERGY GROUP, Baltimore, a utility owner, said it would build a $250 million power plant in Holland Township, Ill.
ITT INDUSTRIES INC., White Plains, won a $43 million contract to supply the United States Naval Air Systems Command with night-vision goggles.
